Name: BOSSES
About the game: BOSSES is a minimalist style action game against BOSS. You can take rewards and use your best heroes to defeat different BOSS! Of course, it's best to have a look at the heroic skills first, just click on the hero's image Watch for reactions between different elements, which can make you good or kill you Or you can try hard-core mode to get the most out of BOSS's housekeeping skills You can also customize your training machine, train your walking and seduction skills! Or export your training machine to other players to enjoy being hanged by your BOSS Most BOSS and heroes are contributors from players, but if you have a good idea, you can contribute in groups Tip: The game is made for one person, the picture quality is very rough, the content is very monotonous, please scratch away Communication Group I: QQ494552317 Communication Group II: QQ305417172
Meta Title: BOSSES: Jan 1, 2023, Falmi and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on BOSSES? Check out the release date (Jan 1, 2023), developer insights from Falmi, and a complete game summary.
